Arch/avr8/hal_serial.c

00001 /* Hardware Abstraction Layer - HAL
00002  * Felipe Astroza - 2007
00003  * file: hal_serial.c
00004  * Arch: AVR{ atmega8, atmega168 }
00005  */
00006 
00007 #include <avr/io.h>
00008 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00009 #include <hal_type.h>
00010 
00011 #ifndef cbi
00012 #define cbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) &= ~_BV(bit))
00013 #endif
00014 #ifndef sbi
00015 #define sbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) |= _BV(bit))
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 static void rx_dummy(uint8_t);
00019 static void (*hal_rx_cb)(uint8_t) = rx_dummy;
00020 
00021 void hal_serial_init(uint32_t speed)
00022 {
00023         sei();
00024 
00025 /* Codigo de arduino - Temporal*/
00026 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega168__)
00027         UBRR0H = ((F_CPU / 16 + speed / 2) / speed - 1) >> 8;
00028         UBRR0L = ((F_CPU / 16 + speed / 2) / speed - 1);
00029         // enable rx and tx
00030         sbi(UCSR0B, RXEN0);
00031         sbi(UCSR0B, TXEN0);
00032 
00033         // enable interrupt on complete reception of a byte
00034         sbi(UCSR0B, RXCIE0);
00035 #else
00036         UBRRH = ((F_CPU / 16 + speed / 2) / speed - 1) >> 8;
00037         UBRRL = ((F_CPU / 16 + speed / 2) / speed - 1);
00038 
00039         // enable rx and tx
00040         sbi(UCSRB, RXEN);
00041         sbi(UCSRB, TXEN);
00042 
00043         // enable interrupt on complete reception of a byte
00044         sbi(UCSRB, RXCIE);
00045 
00046 #endif
00047 }
00048 
00049 void hal_serial_rx_cb( void (*cb)(uint8_t) )
00050 {
00051         hal_rx_cb = cb;
00052 }
00053 
00054 static void serial_putc(uint8_t c)
00055 {
00056 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega168__)
00057         while (!(UCSR0A & (1 << UDRE0)));
00058         UDR0 = c;
00059 #else
00060         while (!(UCSRA & (1 << UDRE)));
00061         UDR = c;
00062 #endif
00063 }
00064 
00065 void hal_serial_write(uint8_t *buf, uint16_t size)
00066 {
00067         uint16_t i;
00068         for(i = 0; i < size; i++)
00069                 serial_putc(buf[i]);
00070 }
00071 
00072 static void rx_dummy(uint8_t c)
00073 {
00074         return;
00075 }
00076 
00077 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega168__)
00078 ISR(USART_RX_vect)
00079 #else
00080 ISR(USART_RXC_vect)
00081 #endif
00082 {
00083 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega168__)
00084         unsigned char c = UDR0;
00085 #else
00086         unsigned char c = UDR;
00087 #endif
00088         hal_rx_cb(c);
00089 }
